reviewText: LOVE his CDs better education than at private school lol

The truth is, I haven't seen the english version of Dudu Fisher's videos.  However, I ADORE his Hebrew DVDs - so educational, so loving, so Jewish, so Israeli!  If you want your children to speak Hebrew, or are want to supplement Hebrew in your home, you MUST purchase Dudu Fisher's DVDs.  He teaches Jewish children to love their heritage, their land, and their brothers with beautiful and catchy music, pleasant imagery, and a friendly, loving demeanor.  I couldn't recommend him more!
